about_the_game:
In this casual multiplayer Co-Op game, play as a squad of vainglorious lifeguards and work together to keep your chaotic beach safe, clean, and most importantly famous!

Start your run with up to 4-players. Use your brains and brawns to cooperate for timely swimmer rescues, gain Fame from completing lifeguard duties, stay on task to avoid getting fired at the end of each Day, and make it to the end of the Week to win!

Will you be Drowning in Seawater? Or Drowning in Fame!?

Completing small challenges such as throwing away trash and "keep it up" with the beach ball is sure to turn some heads. However, putting your lives on the line to save drowning swimmers is the ultimate feat! Just make sure not to make a fool out of yourself, or you'll tank your fame!

Gear Up & Put a Pin in it!

Experiment with a variety of game-changing Gear, such as Whistles and Flippers, as well as passive-effects called Pins to adapt to new swimmer types and events. Discover new synergies and create the highest fame-generating strategies with your squad!

Shop 'til you Drop!

At the end of each day, your squad will get a big payout of Bucks depending on your Fame! Spend your Bucks at the Shop to get new Gear, upgrade your Pin arsenal, improve your beach, and help you and your squad achieve its fullest potential!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10; 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel core i5-6500, or Amd Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10; 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel core i7-6500u, or Amd Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
